column5: LOOKING FOR SOME RECENT INFO ON THE WALLEYE FISNING ON THE SOUTH SHORE AND N.W. ANGLE OF LOTW.

Badger,Fished the south shore of LOTW this past week, tried downrigging one day and it was pretty slow. Got a couple of nice ones but nothing to brag about. The folks that were angling on the reefs did much better. Lot's of nice fish. I believe crawlers were the bait of choice. I didn't head all the way up to the Angle but heard reports that the fishing has been good between Stoney Point and Garden Island. Take care and good fishing,Bob M
